about_the_game:
"Magical Girl Critical DELUXE" is a remake of the well-received action game as a smartphone app, combined with a sequel that was frozen in development due to circumstances, with all the graphics refined and new elements added.

You can do "move" "jump" "avoid" "attack" "magic"+α.

It requires "Critical Thinking" instead of "Technique" or "Reflexes".

By learning new magic and updating your character's abilities, you can expand your range of action.

Defeat enemies, explore every corner of the stage, and collect items to clear the game.

After clearing the game, the story of the second round will unfold and the system will become a run-and-jump game, offering a new game experience in a different stage from the first round.

You can play over and over again with challenging elements like Clear Ranks and Time Attack for boss rush stages.

Watch the magical girl's destiny unfold in a world of nostalgic pixel art and sound.

★Data from the demo version cannot be transferred to the full version.
